EmailTemplate.description: The email sent out to worker to inform them that the application is saved and will expire after some time
EmailTemplate.name: Worker Application Saved for Later
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Draft Application is Saved until {expiryDate}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your draft will be available until Midnight EST on {expiryDate}. You can revisit your draft and submit it via the community {caseItemLink}
